trans-unit.source: An entity type.
trans-unit.target: 任何實體類型。

trans-unit.source: Represents a dynamic entity collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the list is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 表示在加入、移除項目或重新整理清單時提供通知的動態實體集合。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] provides the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> class to support binding data to controls in client applications.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 提供<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>類別，以在用戶端應用程式支援資料繫結至控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class inherits from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> class, which implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface and is the primary data binding mechanism for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and Silverlight-based applications.
trans-unit.target: 此類別繼承自<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>類別，它會實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>介面，並且是 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 和 Silverlight 為基礎的應用程式的主要資料繫結機制。

trans-unit.source: You can load an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> binding collection by using any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過使用實作 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> 介面的任何集合來載入 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 繫結集合。

trans-unit.source: Items loaded into the binding collection must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: 載入到繫結集合的項目必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 介面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Binding Data to Controls](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/binding-data-to-controls-wcf-data-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結至控制項](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/binding-data-to-controls-wcf-data-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is from the code-behind page for an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) page that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例取自用於定義 WPF 中 `SalesOrders` 視窗之可延伸應用程式標記語言 (XAML) 頁面的程式碼後置頁面。

trans-unit.source: When the window is loaded, an <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> is created based on the result of a query that returns customers with related objects, filtered by country.
trans-unit.target: 載入視窗時，將會根據傳回客戶及相關物件 (依國家 (地區) 篩選) 的查詢結果建立 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: This result is bound to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that is the root layout control for the WPF window.
trans-unit.target: 此結果繫結至 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> (WPF 視窗的根配置控制項) 的 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following is the XAML that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 以下是上一個範例中用於定義 WPF 中 `SalesOrders` 視窗的 XAML。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 已啟用自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> for <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用建構函式提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 值給 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you use manual tracking, you must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> 並處理引發事件，向 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 手動回報變更。

trans-unit.source: Automatic change tracking begins after items are loaded into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目載入到集合之後，就會開始自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> or LINQ query that returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection of objects that are used to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> 或 LINQ 查詢，可傳回用來初始化集合之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class based on query execution.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，此執行個體基於查詢執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of objects supplied for `items` is usually a query that returns the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 的物件 `items` 集合通常是傳回集合中之項目的查詢。

trans-unit.source: However, any <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of the correct type can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 但是，也可以提供正確型別的任何 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 集合。

trans-unit.source: By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 已啟用自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> for <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用建構函式提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 值給 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you use manual tracking, you must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> 並處理引發事件，向 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 手動回報變更。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> used to track changes to objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />，用來追蹤集合中之物件的變更。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class that uses the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an empty <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> to which entity objects can be added without executing a query against the service or when an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> is not available.
trans-unit.target: 使用此建構函式建立空白 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>，在不對服務執行查詢或沒有可用 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 的情況下加入實體物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 已啟用自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> for <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用建構函式提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 值給 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you use manual tracking, you must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> 並處理引發事件，向 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 手動回報變更。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> or LINQ query that returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection of objects that are used to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> 或 LINQ 查詢，可傳回用來初始化集合之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode" /> value that indicated whether or not changes made to items in the collection are automatically tracked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode" /> 值，此值指出是否自動追蹤集合中之項目的變更。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class based on query execution and with the specified tracking mode.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，此執行個體基於查詢執行並使用指定的追蹤模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 已啟用自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: Use this class constructor and supply a value of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> for `trackingMode` to create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> that uses manual change tracking.
trans-unit.target: 使用此類別建構函式並提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> 值給 `trackingMode`，以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you use manual tracking, you must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> 並處理引發事件，向 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 手動回報變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of objects supplied for `items` is usually a query that returns the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 的物件 `items` 集合通常是傳回集合中之項目的查詢。

trans-unit.source: However, any <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of the correct type can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 但是，也可以提供正確型別的任何 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> used to track items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />，用來追蹤集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The entity set of the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中物件的實體集。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that encapsulates a method that is called when an entity changes.
trans-unit.target: 封裝實體變更時所呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that encapsulates a method that is called when the collection of entities changes.
trans-unit.target: 封裝實體集合變更時所呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class with the supplied change method delegates and that uses the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，此執行個體使用提供的變更方法委派以及使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an empty <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> to which entity objects can be added without executing a query against the service or when an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> is not available.
trans-unit.target: 使用此建構函式建立空白 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>，在不對服務執行查詢或沒有可用 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 的情況下加入實體物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 已啟用自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> for <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用建構函式提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 值給 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you use manual tracking, you must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> 並處理引發事件，向 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 手動回報變更。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> or LINQ query that returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection of objects that are used to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> 或 LINQ 查詢，可傳回用來初始化集合之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode" /> value that indicated whether or not changes made to items in the collection are automatically tracked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode" /> 值，此值指出是否自動追蹤集合中之項目的變更。

trans-unit.source: The entity set of the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中物件的實體集。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that encapsulates a method that is called when an entity changes.
trans-unit.target: 封裝實體變更時所呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that encapsulates a method that is called when the collection of entities changes.
trans-unit.target: 封裝實體集合變更時所呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class a based on query execution and with the supplied change method delegates.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，此執行個體基於查詢執行並使用提供的變更方法委派。

trans-unit.source: The `entityChanged` and `collectionChanged` functions are invoked by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: `entityChanged` 和 `collectionChanged` 函數分別是由 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> 事件叫用。

trans-unit.source: The `entityChanged` method takes an <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityCollectionChangedParams> value and the `collectionChanged` method takes a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityChangedParams> value.
trans-unit.target: `entityChanged` 方法接受 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityCollectionChangedParams> 值，而 `collectionChanged` 方法則接受 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityChangedParams> 值。

trans-unit.source: Both methods must return a Boolean value that indicates whether the event was handled by the function.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種方法都必須傳回布林值，指出函數是否已處理事件。

trans-unit.source: When the method returns `true`, the default behavior still occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此方法傳回時`true`，仍會發生預設行為。

trans-unit.source: By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 已啟用自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> for <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用建構函式提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 值給 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you use manual tracking, you must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> 並處理引發事件，向 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 手動回報變更。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> used to track items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />，用來追蹤集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> or LINQ query that returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> collection of objects that are used to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery`1" /> 或 LINQ 查詢，可傳回用來初始化集合之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode" /> value that indicated whether or not changes made to items in the collection are automatically tracked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode" /> 值，此值指出是否自動追蹤集合中之項目的變更。

trans-unit.source: The entity set of the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中物件的實體集。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that encapsulates a method that is called when an entity changes.
trans-unit.target: 封裝實體變更時所呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that encapsulates a method that is called when the collection of entities changes.
trans-unit.target: 封裝實體集合變更時所呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> class a based on query execution, with the supplied change method delegates, and that uses the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，此執行個體基於查詢執行、使用提供的變更方法委派，以及使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 已啟用自動變更追蹤。

trans-unit.source: Use this class constructor to supply a value of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> for `trackingMode` to create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> that uses manual change tracking.
trans-unit.target: 使用此類別建構函式提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.TrackingMode.None> 值給 `trackingMode`，以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you use manual tracking, you must implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> 並處理引發事件，向 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 手動回報變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> must be supplied when `items` is not a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery%601> or <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.QueryOperationResponse%601> that has a reference to a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 不是具有 `items` 執行個體參考的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQuery%601> 或 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.QueryOperationResponse%601> 時，必須提供 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>。

trans-unit.source: The `entityChanged` and `collectionChanged` functions are invoked by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: `entityChanged` 和 `collectionChanged` 函數分別是由 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> 事件叫用。

trans-unit.source: The `entityChanged` method takes an <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityCollectionChangedParams> value and the `collectionChanged` method takes a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityChangedParams> value.
trans-unit.target: `entityChanged` 方法接受 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityCollectionChangedParams> 值，而 `collectionChanged` 方法則接受 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityChangedParams> 值。

trans-unit.source: Both methods must return a Boolean value that indicates whether the event was handled by the function.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種方法都必須傳回布林值，指出函數是否已處理事件。

trans-unit.source: When the method returns `true`, the default behavior will still occur.
trans-unit.target: 此方法傳回時`true`，還是會發生預設行為。

trans-unit.source: When <see langword="true" />, detaches all items from the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，則會從 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> 中斷所有項目的連結。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection, and optionally detaches all the items from the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有項目，並選擇性地從 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> 卸離所有項目。

trans-unit.source: When an item is detached, all related objects in the data graph are also detached from the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當項目卸離時，資料圖形中的所有相關物件也會從 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 卸離。

trans-unit.source: Gets a continuation object that is used to return the next set of paged results.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於傳回下一組分頁式結果的接續物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQueryContinuation`1" /> object that contains the URI to return the next set of paged results.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQueryContinuation`1" /> 物件，其中包含用於傳回下一組分頁式結果的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Continuation%2A> property returns a link that is used to access the next set of paged results when paging is enabled in the data service.
trans-unit.target: 當資料服務中啟用分頁時，<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Continuation%2A> 屬性會傳回用於存取下一組分頁式結果的連結。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring the Data Service](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/configuring-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定資料服務](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/configuring-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: When loading a paged result into a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>, you must explicitly load pages by calling the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%600%7D%29> method on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> by passing the result of the execution of the URI that was obtained from the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Continuation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 將分頁式結果載入到 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 時，您必須透過呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%600%7D%29> 上的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> 方法，傳遞從 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Continuation%2A> 屬性取得的 URI 執行結果，明確載入頁面。

trans-unit.source: The following example is from the code-behind page for an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) page that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例取自用於定義 WPF 中 `SalesOrders` 視窗之可延伸應用程式標記語言 (XAML) 頁面的程式碼後置頁面。

trans-unit.source: When the window is loaded, a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> is created based on the result of a query that returns customers, filtered by country.
trans-unit.target: 載入視窗時，會根據傳回客戶 (按國家 (地區) 排序) 查詢的結果建立 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: All of the pages of this paged result are loaded, along with the related orders, and are bound to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that is the root layout control for the WPF window.
trans-unit.target: 此分頁結果的所有頁面都會載入 (包含相關的訂單)，並且會繫結至 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> (WPF 視窗的根配置控制項) 的 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to Windows Presentation Foundation Elements](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/bind-data-to-wpf-elements-wcf-data-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將資料繫結至 Windows Presentation Foundation 項目](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/bind-data-to-wpf-elements-wcf-data-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: Disables <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> tracking of all items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 停用 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> 對集合中之所有項目的追蹤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Detach%2A> method can only be called when <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> is the root collection.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Detach%2A> 是根集合時才能呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Detach%2A> method is called on a collection that is a root collection, tracking is also stopped for all related objects in the data graph.
trans-unit.target: 在根集合上呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Detach%2A> 方法時，也會停止追蹤資料圖形中的所有相關物件。

trans-unit.source: Index at which to add the item.
trans-unit.target: 要加入項目的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The item to add.
trans-unit.target: 要新增的項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified item to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的項目加入到集合中指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: When you are manually tracking changes to the collection, you must override the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.InsertItem%2A> method to prevent items from being automatically added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您手動追蹤集合變更時，您必須覆寫 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.InsertItem%2A> 方法以防止項目自動加入到集合。

trans-unit.source: Loads entities into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將實體載入到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Collection of entity objects to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入到 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> 的實體物件集合。

trans-unit.source: Loads a collection of entity objects into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將實體物件集合載入到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> method attaches all objects in the collection, if they are not already attached to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> that is associated with the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> 方法會附加集合中的所有物件 (如果這些物件還沒有附加到與 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 相關聯的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>)。

trans-unit.source: When an object is attached by using the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> method, all related objects are also attached.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> 方法附加物件時，也會附加所有相關物件。

trans-unit.source: Entity object to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的實體物件。

trans-unit.source: Loads a single entity object into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將單一實體物件載入到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> method attaches the object, if it is not already attached to the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> that is associated with the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> 方法會附加此物件 (如果此物件還沒有附加到與 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> 相關聯的 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>)。

trans-unit.source: When an object is attached by using the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> method, all related objects are also attached.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601.Load%2A> 方法附加物件時，也會附加所有相關物件。
